mapper.insert: insert into plan_upload(filename,filedata,parentid,filetype) values(#{filename},#{filedata},#{parentid},#{filetype})
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_SJGZ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_LMGZ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_XJ set sbzt=1,sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_SJGZ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_LMGZ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_XJ set sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id=#{id}
update KXXYJ_SJGZ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from KXXYJ_SJGZ where ${value}
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_LMGZ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from KXXYJ_LMGZ where ${value}
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_XJ set shzt=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from KXXYJ_XJ where ${value}
mapper.insert: insert into cbsj_sjgz(id,xmmc,xmbm,xzqh,xzqhdm,gydw,gydwdm,qdzh,zdzh,jsjsdj,jsxz,jsdw,dfzc,yhdk,jszlc,kgsj,wgsj,tz) select sys_guid(),xmmc,xmbm,xzqh,xzqhdm,gydw1,gydwdm1,qdzh,zdzh,jsjsdj,jsxz,jsdw,dfzc,yhdk,jszlc,kgny,wgny,tzgs from kxxyj_sjgz where xmbm=#{xmbm}

insert into cbsj_lmgz(id,xmmc,xmbm,xzqh,xzqhdm,gydw,gydwdm,qdzh,zdzh,jsjsdj,jsxz,jsdw,dfzc,yhdk,kgsj,wgsj,tz) select sys_guid(),xmmc,xmbm,xzqh,xzqhdm,gydw1,gydwdm1,qdzh,zdzh,jsjsdj,jsxz,jsdw,dfzc,yhdk,kgny,wgny,tzgs from kxxyj_lmgz where xmbm=#{xmbm}

insert into cbsj_xj(id,xmmc,xmbm,xzqh,xzqhdm,gydw,gydwdm,qdzh,zdzh,jsjsdj,jsxz,jsdw,dfzc,yhdk,kgsj,wgsj,tz) select sys_guid(),k.xmmc,k.xmbm,k.xzqh,k.xzqhdm,k.gydw1,k.gydwdm1,k.qdzh,k.zdzh,k.jsjsdj,k.jsxz,k.jsdw,k.dfzc,k.yhdk,k.kgny,k.wgny,k.tzgs from kxxyj_xj k where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select * from cbsj_sjgz where ${value} and sfbj=1
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_SJGZ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select * from cbsj_lmgz where ${value} and sfbj=1
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_LMGZ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select * from cbsj_xj where ${value} and sfbj=1
mapper.update: update KXXYJ_XJ set shzt=0 where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select t.*,bzcs bzys,xmid xmbm,lxbm ghlxbh from lxsh_lx t where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.insert: insert into lxsh_lx (xmid, lxbm, lxmc, xzqh, xzqhdm, gydw, gydwdm, qdzh, zdzh, jsjsdj, lc, xjsdj, jsxz, qdmc, zdmc, bzcs, sffirst, jdbs,gpsqdzh,gpszdzh,jsfa,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc ,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh,xjlc,jhlc,ghlxbm,ghlxmc,lqhntmchd,lqhntmc,gxlqhntmchd,gxlqhntmc,snhntmchd,snhntmc,lqlmjdrzshd,lqlmjdrzs,lqlmcbrzshd,lqlmcbrzs,swjchd,swjc,lqlmpmlqjdlzshd,lqlmpmlqjdlzs,lqlmrhlqjdlzshd,lqlmrhlqjdlzs,lqlmcblzshd,lqlmcblzs,xzrxjchd,xzrxjc,swjclzshd,swjclzs,xfchd,xfc,wcsnmbhd,wcsnmb,wcswjchd,wcswjc,snhntmchbhd,snhntmchb,bxhd,bx,snhntmcsshhd,snhntmcssh,sbzj,lxlmkd,xzqhdm2,xzqhmc2,gxlxbm,gxqdzh,gxzdzh,ghqdzh,ghzdzh,snhntmchbmj) select xmid, lxbm, lxmc, xzqh, xzqhdm, gydw, gydwdm, qdzh, zdzh, jsjsdj, lc, xjsdj, jsxz, qdmc, zdmc, bzcs, sffirst, to_char(to_number(#{jdbs})),qdzh,zdzh,jsfa,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc ,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh,xjlc,jhlc,ghlxbm,ghlxmc,lqhntmchd,lqhntmc,gxlqhntmchd,gxlqhntmc,snhntmchd,snhntmc,lqlmjdrzshd,lqlmjdrzs,lqlmcbrzshd,lqlmcbrzs,swjchd,swjc,lqlmpmlqjdlzshd,lqlmpmlqjdlzs,lqlmrhlqjdlzshd,lqlmrhlqjdlzs,lqlmcblzshd,lqlmcblzs,xzrxjchd,xzrxjc,swjclzshd,swjclzs,xfchd,xfc,wcsnmbhd,wcsnmb,wcswjchd,wcswjc,snhntmchbhd,snhntmchb,bxhd,bx,snhntmcsshhd,snhntmcssh,sbzj,lxlmkd,xzqhdm2,xzqhmc2,gxlxbm,gxqdzh,gxzdzh,ghqdzh,ghzdzh,snhntmchbmj from lxsh_lx where xmid in(${xmbm}) and jdbs=to_char(to_number(#{jdbs})-1)
insert into plan_upload(filename,filedata,parentid,filetype) values(#{filename},#{filedata},#{jhid},#{filetype})
insert into plan_upload(filename,filedata,parentid,filetype) values(#{filename},#{filedata},#{jhid},#{filetype})
mapper.update: update kxxyj_sjgz set xmmc=#{1},qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{5},jsxz=#{19},dq=#{21}, dq_m=#{20},jsjsdj=#{22},sd=#{24},sd_m=#{23},sbthcd=7,tbbmbm='36', kgny=#{25},wgny=#{26},bzdw=#{27},tzgs=#{28},dfzc=#{29},yhdk=#{30},gkpfwh=#{31},pfsj=#{32},xzqh=#{2},xzqhdm=substr(#{0},5,6) where xmbm=#{0}

update lxsh_lx set qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{5},xzqh=#{2},lc=to_number(#{6}),yilc=#{7},erlc=#{8},sanlc=#{9}, silc=#{10},dwlc=#{11},wllc=#{12},jhyilc=#{13},jherlc=#{14},jhsanlc=#{15},jhsilc=#{16},jhdwlc=#{17},jhwllc=#{18}, jsjsdj=#{22},xzqhdm=substr(#{0},5,6) where xmid=#{0} and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1'

update kxxyj_lmgz set xmmc=#{1},qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{5},jsxz=#{13},dq=#{15}, dq_m=#{14},jsjsdj=#{16},sd=#{18},sd_m=#{17},sbthcd=7,tbbmbm='36', kgny=#{19},wgny=#{20},bzdw=#{21},tzgs=#{22},dfzc=#{23},yhdk=#{24},gkpfwh=#{25},pfsj=#{26},xzqh=#{2},xzqhdm=substr(#{0},5,6) where xmbm=#{0}

update lxsh_lx set qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{5},xzqh=#{2},lc=#{6},yilc=#{7},erlc=#{8},sanlc=#{9},silc=#{10},dwlc=#{11},wllc=#{12}, jsjsdj=#{16},xzqhdm=substr(#{0},5,6) where xmid=#{0} and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1'

update kxxyj_xj set xmmc=#{1},qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{5},jsxz=#{17},dq=#{19}, dq_m=#{18},jsjsdj=#{20},sd=#{22},sd_m=#{21},sbthcd=7,tbbmbm='36', kgny=#{23},wgny=#{24},bzdw=#{25},tzgs=#{26},dfzc=#{27},yhdk=#{28},gkpfwh=#{29},pfsj=#{30},xzqh=#{2},xzqhdm=substr(#{0},5,6) where xmbm=#{0}

update lxsh_lx set qdzh=#{4},zdzh=#{5},xzqh=#{2},lc=#{6},xjlxbm=#{7},xjqdzh=#{8},xjzdzh=#{9},xjlc=#{10}, yilc=#{11},erlc=#{12},sanlc=#{13},silc=#{14},dwlc=#{15},wllc=#{16},jsjsdj=#{20},xzqhdm=substr(#{0},5,6) where xmid=#{0} and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1'
mapper.select:
select count(*) sl,nvl(sum(t1.tz),0) tz,nvl(sum(lx.lc),0) lc,nvl(sum(lx.bzcs),0) bzcs from KXXYJ_SJGZ_tz t Left join lxsh_sjgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm left join (select xmid,sum(lc) lc,min(xjsdj) xjsdj,min(jsjsdj) jsjsdj,min(lxbm) lxbm,sum(bzcs) bzcs from lxsh_lx_TZ where jdbs='1' group by xmid ) lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid where 1=1
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%'
and t1.xmnf like '%'||#{xmnf}||'%'
and t.shzt like '%'||#{sbzt1}||'%'
${tsdq}
and t.jsjsdj like '%'||#{jsdj}||'%'
and ghlxbh like #{gldj}||'%'
and t.xmbm in (select distinct xmid from lxsh_lx lx where lx.lxbm like '%'||#{ghlxbh}||'%')
and lxmc like '%'||#{lxmc}||'%'
mapper.update: update kxxyj_sjgz set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update kxxyj_lmgz set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update kxxyj_xj set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_sjgz set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_lmgz set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_xj set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_sh set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_yhdzx set tzxz=#{tzxz},tzsj=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where xmbm=#{xmbm}

select * from kxxyj_lmgz_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from kxxyj_xj_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from cbsj_sjgz_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}

select * from cbsj_sh_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from cbsj_yhdzx_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.insert: insert into kxxyj_sjgz_tz select * from kxxyj_sjgz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into kxxyj_lmgz_tz select * from kxxyj_lmgz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into kxxyj_xj_tz select * from kxxyj_xj where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_sjgz_tz select * from cbsj_sjgz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_lmgz_tz select * from cbsj_lmgz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_xj_tz select * from cbsj_xj where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_sh_tz select * from cbsj_sh where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_yhdzx_tz select * from cbsj_yhdzx where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into lxsh_lx_tz select * from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.update: update kxxyj_sjgz_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update kxxyj_lmgz_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update kxxyj_xj_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_sjgz_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_lmgz_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_xj_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_sh_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_yhdzx_tz set tzxz=#{tzxz} where xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.delete: delete from lxsh_lx where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.insert: insert into kxxyj_sjgz select * from kxxyj_sjgz_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into kxxyj_lmgz select * from kxxyj_lmgz_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into kxxyj_xj select * from kxxyj_xj_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_sjgz select * from cbsj_sjgz_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_lmgz select * from cbsj_lmgz_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_xj select * from cbsj_xj_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_sh select * from cbsj_sh_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into cbsj_yhdzx select * from cbsj_yhdzx_tz where xmbm=#{xmbm}
insert into lxsh_lx select * from lxsh_lx_tz where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.delete: delete from lxsh_lx_tz where xmid=#{xmbm} and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.select: select rownum num ,t.*,t1.lsjl,t1.ghlxbh lxbh,t1.gydwdm, t.shzt sbzt1,lx.*,sl.xmsl from KXXYJ_SJGZ t Left join lxsh_sjgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm left join (select qdzh minqdzh,zdzh maxzdzh,xmid,lc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc, dwlc,wllc,jhyilc,jherlc,jhsanlc,jhsilc,jhdwlc,jhwllc,qdmc,zdmc from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' and sffirst='1') lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid left join (select xmid,count(xmid) xmsl,decode(substr(xmid,11,1),1,(nvl(sum(jhyilc),0)+nvl(sum(jherlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsanlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsilc),0)+nvl(sum(jhdwlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhwllc),0)),(nvl(sum(yilc),0)+nvl(sum(erlc),0)+nvl(sum(sanlc),0)+nvl(sum(silc),0)+nvl(sum(dwlc),0)+nvl(sum(wllc),0))) zlc from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' group by xmid) sl on t.xmbm=sl.xmid where 1=1 and t.xmbm=#{xmbm}

select rownum num ,t.*,t1.lsjl,t1.ghlxbh lxbh,t1.gydwdm,t.shzt sbzt1,lx.*,sl.xmsl from KXXYJ_LMGZ t Left join lxsh_lmgz t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm left join (select qdzh minqdzh,zdzh maxzdzh,xmid,lc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc,qdmc,zdmc from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' and jdbs='1' and sffirst='1') lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid left join (select xmid,count(xmid) xmsl,decode(substr(xmid,11,1),1,(nvl(sum(jhyilc),0)+nvl(sum(jherlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsanlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsilc),0)+nvl(sum(jhdwlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhwllc),0)),(nvl(sum(yilc),0)+nvl(sum(erlc),0)+nvl(sum(sanlc),0)+nvl(sum(silc),0)+nvl(sum(dwlc),0)+nvl(sum(wllc),0))) zlc from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' group by xmid) sl on t.xmbm=sl.xmid where 1=1 and t.xmbm=#{xmbm}

select rownum num ,t.*,t1.ghlxbh lxbh,t1.gydwdm,t.shzt sbzt1,lx.*,sl.xmsl from KXXYJ_XJ t left join lxsh_xj t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm left join (select qdmc,zdmc,lxmc,qdzh minqdzh,zdzh maxzdzh,xmid, lc,xjlc,yilc,erlc,sanlc,silc,dwlc,wllc,xjlxbm,xjqdzh,xjzdzh from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' and sffirst='1') lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid left join (select xmid,count(xmid) xmsl,decode(substr(xmid,11,1),1,(nvl(sum(jhyilc),0)+nvl(sum(jherlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsanlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsilc),0)+nvl(sum(jhdwlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhwllc),0)),(nvl(sum(yilc),0)+nvl(sum(erlc),0)+nvl(sum(sanlc),0)+nvl(sum(silc),0)+nvl(sum(dwlc),0)+nvl(sum(wllc),0))) zlc from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' group by xmid) sl on t.xmbm=sl.xmid where 1=1 and t.xmbm=#{xmbm}

select count(*) from KXXYJ_SH t Left join xmsq_sh t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm left join (select xmid,count(*) xmsl,decode(substr(xmid,11,1),1,(nvl(sum(jhyilc),0)+nvl(sum(jherlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsanlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsilc),0)+nvl(sum(jhdwlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhwllc),0)),(nvl(sum(yilc),0)+nvl(sum(erlc),0)+nvl(sum(sanlc),0)+nvl(sum(silc),0)+nvl(sum(dwlc),0)+nvl(sum(wllc),0))) zlc,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(lxbm),',',',') lxbmtj,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(lxmc),',',',') lxmctj, replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(ghlxbm),',',',') ghlxbm,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(ghlxmc),',',',') ghlxmc,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(jsjsdj),',',',') jsdjtj from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' group by xmid) sl on t.xmbm=sl.xmid where 1=1 ${xzqh} and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%' and substr(t.xmbm,0,4) in (${xmnf}) and ${jsdj} and ${gldj} ${tsdq}
and lxbmtj like '%'||#{lxbm}||'%'
and lxmctj like '%'||#{lxmc}||'%'
and sl.ghlxbm like '%'||#{ghlxbm}||'%'
and sl.ghlxmc like '%'||#{ghlxmc}||'%'
and t1.lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'
and to_char(t.sbzt) like '%'||#{sbzt1}||'%'
and to_char(t.shzt) like '%'||#{shzt}||'%'
and (t.xmbm in (select distinct xmid from lxsh_lx lx where lx.ghlxmc like '%'||#{ghlxmc}||'%')
)

select count(*) sl,nvl(sum(t.tzgs),0) tz,nvl(sum(lx.lc),0) lc,'0' bzcs,'0' sbz,'0' sjl,'0' dftz from KXXYJ_SH t Left join xmsq_sh t1 on t.xmbm=t1.xmbm left join (select xmid,count(*) xmsl,decode(substr(xmid,11,1),1,(nvl(sum(jhyilc),0)+nvl(sum(jherlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsanlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhsilc),0)+nvl(sum(jhdwlc),0)+nvl(sum(jhwllc),0)),(nvl(sum(yilc),0)+nvl(sum(erlc),0)+nvl(sum(sanlc),0)+nvl(sum(silc),0)+nvl(sum(dwlc),0)+nvl(sum(wllc),0))) zlc,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(lxbm),',',',') lxbmtj,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(lxmc),',',',') lxmctj, replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(ghlxbm),',',',') ghlxbm,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(ghlxmc),',',',') ghlxmc,replace(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(jsjsdj),',',',') jsdjtj from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' group by xmid) sl on t.xmbm=sl.xmid left join (select xmid,sum(lc) lc,min(xjsdj) xjsdj,min(jsjsdj) jsjsdj,min(lxbm) lxbm,sum(bzcs) bzcs from lxsh_lx where jdbs='1' group by xmid) lx on t.xmbm=lx.xmid where 1=1 ${xzqh} and t.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%' and substr(t.xmbm,0,4) in (${xmnf}) and ${jsdj} and ${gldj} ${tsdq}
and lxbmtj like '%'||#{lxbm}||'%'
and lxmctj like '%'||#{lxmc}||'%'
and sl.ghlxbm like '%'||#{ghlxbm}||'%'
and sl.ghlxmc like '%'||#{ghlxmc}||'%'
and t1.lsjl like '%'||#{lsjl}||'%'
and to_char(t.sbzt) like '%'||#{sbzt1}||'%'
and to_char(t.shzt) like '%'||#{shzt}||'%'
and (t.xmbm in (select distinct xmid from lxsh_lx lx where lx.ghlxmc like '%'||#{ghlxmc}||'%')
)
mapper.update: update kxxyj_sh set shzt=1 where xmbm in (${xmbm})
update ${bz} set sbzt='1',sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where xmbm in (${xmbm})
update ${bz} set thyy=#{thyy},sbzt=#{sbzt},sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where xmbm in (${xmbm})
update ${bz} set thyy=#{thyy},sbzt=#{sbzt} where xmbm in (${xmbm})
mapper.select: select * from ${bzcs} where xmbm in (${xmbm}) and shzt='1'
mapper.update: update ${bz} set shzt='0' where xmbm in (${xmbm})
mapper.delete: delete from lxsh_lx where xmid in (${xmbm}) and jdbs=#{jdbs}
mapper.update: update ${bz} set bz=(case when bz like '%'||gkpfwh||'%' then bz when bz is null or bz='' then gkpfwh else bz||','||gkpfwh end),TZXZ='' where xmbm=#{xmbm}
update ${bz} set bz=(case when bz like '%'||sjpfwh||'%' then bz when bz is null or bz='' then sjpfwh else bz||','||sjpfwh end),TZXZ='' where xmbm=#{xmbm}
